{{Infobox Embedded System |image1 = <!-- Image filename --> |image1_size = <!-- Image size, ex.150px --> |caption = Intrinsyc CerfBoard 255 |caption2 = <!-- 2nd tagleine --> |pp = <!-- product page url only --> |sp = <!-- Support page url only --> |dl = <!-- Download page url only --> |wikidevi = <!-- wikidevi.wi-cat.ru page, included underscores --> |wikipedia = <!-- [[wikipedia:Main Page|Wikipedia]] Leave blank for none --> |ddwrtsupport = <!-- Activation, Donation, Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, TBD, Unofficially, WIP --> |openwrtsupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, --> |tomatosupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, --> |gargoylesupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, -->
|brand = Intrinsyc |model = CerfBoard |submodelappend = yes |submodel = 255 |revision = <!-- Model Revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = |page_start_date = |page_start_origon = |series = <!-- Device series --> |type = single-board computer |sernum = <!-- First 4 or so for easy version identification --> |fcc_id = <!-- Federal Communication Commission Identification Number --> |icid = <!-- Industry Canada Identification number, Leave blank for unknown --> |us_id = <!-- US ID number --> |boardid = <!-- Board Identification, Leave blank for none --> |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id -->
|cpu1chip1 = Intel XScale;PXA255; |cpu1_cores = 1 |cpu1_type = ARMv5TE |cpu1_type_rev = Cotulla |cpu1spd = 200 <!-- 200 / 300 / 400 MHz --> |is_doc = |bus = <!-- 8-bit, 16-bit, 32-bit, 64-bit, Leave blank for none -->
|flash1type = <!-- Parallel,Serial(SPI),SPI NOR,NAND,Compact Flash, --> |fla1_num = 2 |fla1chip = Intel;28F128J3C150; |flash1size = 32 |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = <!-- DDR,DDR2,DDR3,DDR4, --> |ram1type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM, --> |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 64 |ram1chip = Samsung;K4S561632E-TC75; |ram1_num = 2 |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth1chip = SMSC;LAN91C111;LAN91C111-NE |lan_ports = 1 |lan_speed = 100MbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = 00:D0:CA
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = Cerf Generic Bootloader;V0.11;; |stockos = Windows;Embedded CE;4.2 Pro;
|exp_if_types = USB 1.1, CompactFlash |exp_sim_num = <!-- Number of sim Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_pcmcia_num = <!-- Number of pcmcia ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_expcard_num = <!-- Number of Expresscard ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipci_num = <!-- Number of Mini PCI Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipcie_num = <!-- Number of Mini PCIexpress Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_usb_num = 1 |exp_cf_num = 1 |exp_sdmmc_num = <!-- Number SD/MMC Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_ide_num = <!-- Number of ide ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_ata_num = <!-- Number of ATA Ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sata_num = <!-- Number of sata ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_esata_num = <!-- Number of esata ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_parallel = <!-- Number of parallel ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sfp_num = <!-- Number of sfp ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_M.2 = <!-- Number of M.2 ports, Leave blank for none --> |usb_hub = <!-- USB hub compatibility -->
|pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 5 |pwr_amp_dc = 2.4 |pwr_conn = barrel |pwr_barrel_outer = 3.5 |pwr_barrel_inner = 1.3 |pwr_barrel_len = <!-- Length of barrel --> |pwr_pol = <!-- Connector polarity -->
|serial = yes,, 10-pin header,, populated, |jtag = <!-- Full JTAG info -->
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = CompactFlash, UART, RTC w/ battery backup, |addchip = CMOS Real Time Clock;Philips;PCF8563;;1; 32 Macrocell CPLD;Xilink;XCR3032XL;;1;,,, 3.3V-5V 400 kbps RS232 3-Driver/5-Receiver Transceiver;STMicro;ST3243EC;;1;,,, 64Kb Serial 3V FRAM Memory;Farnell;FM24CL64;;1;,,, 64Kb I2C compatible 2-wire Serial EEPROM;Microchip;24LC64;;1;,,, 16-bit Bus Transceiver W/ 3-State Outputs;TI;SN74LVCH16245A;;4;,,, Dual Output Low-Dropout Voltage Regulator;TI;TPS70402;;1;,,, DMOS 500mA Low-Dropout Regulator;Burr Brown;REG103;;1;,,, |802dot11_protocols = none
|defaulip = <!-- ???.???.???.???, default IP Address --> |defaultlogin = <!-- default Login Name, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultpass = <!-- default Password, Leave blank for unknown --> |is_manuf = Yes |tpfirmware = Linux
|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = <!-- FCCID approval date --> |estreldate = <!-- Estimated release date --> |estprice = <!-- Estimated retail price in US dollars --> |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = Canada
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== ===Specifications=== *CPU: ''[[Intel XScale]]'' PXA255 :ARMv5TE @400MHz *RAM: 64MB (DR SDRAM) *Storage: 32MB (NOR) flash *Network: 1x Fast Ethernet *USB: 1x USB 1.1 port *Power: 5V/2.4A barrel *Dimensions (L x W): 2.75 x 2.5"
==See also== *[[Intrinsyc CerfCube]] • [[Intel StrongARM]] GDS1110BC (@192MHz) *[[Intrinsyc CerfCube 405EP]] • [[AMCC]]/[[IBM]] PowerPC 405EP ([https://www.ixbt.com/news/hard/index.shtml?00/72/07 802.11b, BT]) *[[Intrinsyc CerfPod]] • [[Intel StrongARM]] GDS1110BC (@192MHz) <!-- 32MB RAM, 16MB Flash -->([https://people.apache.org/~jim/NewArchitect/webtech/2001/10/infrrevu/index.html Spec.])
[[Category:English Documentation]]
